Sentencas: Oxygen exchange measurements have been applied to determine simultaneously the chemical diffusion coefficient and the surface exchange coefficient of oxide perovskites.
Titulo: Oxygen exchange measurements on perovskites as cathode materials for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The oxygen partial pressure is changed in a step-wise manner and the relaxation of the oxide ceramics is followed as a function of time.
Titulo: Oxygen exchange measurements on perovskites as cathode materials for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Instead of recording the amount of exchanged oxygen, the rate of oxygen incorporation reactions is measured directly.
Titulo: Oxygen exchange measurements on perovskites as cathode materials for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: It is shown how the kinetic parameters can be extracted from the time dependence of the oxygen flux between the sample and the surrounding gas phase.
Titulo: Oxygen exchange measurements on perovskites as cathode materials for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The effect of finite switching times of the reactor on the relaxing oxygen flux is investigated theoretically.
Titulo: Oxygen exchange measurements on perovskites as cathode materials for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The time constant of the reactor is shown to be negligibly small under the chosen experimental conditions.
Titulo: Oxygen exchange measurements on perovskites as cathode materials for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The oxygen exchange measurements have been performed on La0.6Sr0.4CoO3-delta (LSC) at 725 and 825 degreesC as a function of the oxygen partial pressure p(O-2) ranging from 10(-4) to 10(-3) bar.
Titulo: Oxygen exchange measurements on perovskites as cathode materials for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The chemical diffusion coefficient is almost independent Of P(02) at constant temperature, whereas the exchange coefficient increases significantly with increasing p(O-2).
Titulo: Oxygen exchange measurements on perovskites as cathode materials for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Finally, the dependence of the chemical exchange coefficient on the oxygen partial pressure is interpreted in terms of different mechanisms for the surface reaction.
Titulo: Oxygen exchange measurements on perovskites as cathode materials for solid oxide fuel cells
